verses.verse: Wisdom<WH2454> has built<WH1129> her house.<WH1004> She has carved out<WH2672> her seven<WH7651> pillars.<WH5982>
She has prepared<WH2873> her meat.<WH2874> She has mixed<WH4537> her wine.<WH3196> She has also set<WH6186> her table.<WH7979>
She has sent out<WH7971> her maidens.<WH5291> She cries<WH7121> from<WH1610> the highest places<WH4791> of the city:<WH7176>
"Whoever is simple,<WH6612> let him turn in<WH5493> here!<WH2638>" As for him who is void of understanding,<WH3820> she says to him,<WH559>
"Come,<WH3212> eat<WH3898> some of my bread,<WH3899> Drink<WH8354> some of the wine<WH3196> which I have mixed!<WH4537>
Leave<WH5800> your simple<WH6612> ways,<WH2421> and live. Walk<WH833> in the way<WH1870> of understanding.<WH998>"
He who corrects<WH3256> a mocker<WH3887> invites<WH3947> insult.<WH7036> He who reproves<WH3198> a wicked<WH7563> man invites abuse.<WH3971>
Don't<WH3198> reprove a scoffer,<WH3887> lest he hate<WH8130> you.<WH3198> Reprove a wise man,<WH2450> and he will love you.<WH157>
Instruct<WH5414> a wise<WH2450> man,<WH2450> and he will be still wiser. Teach<WH3045> a righteous<WH6662> man,<WH3254> and he will increase in learning.<WH3948>
The fear<WH3374> of Yahweh<WH3068> is the beginning<WH8462> of wisdom.<WH2451> The knowledge<WH1847> of the Holy<WH6918> One is understanding.<WH998>
For by me your days<WH3117> will be multiplied.<WH7235> The years<WH8141> of your life<WH2416> will be increased.<WH3254>
If you are wise,<WH2449> you are wise<WH2449> for yourself.<WH3887> If you mock, you alone will bear it.<WH5375>
The foolish<WH3687> woman<WH802> is loud,<WH1993> Undisciplined,<WH6615> and<WH1077> knows<WH3045> nothing.<WH4100>
She sits<WH3427> at the door<WH6607> of her house,<WH1004> on a seat<WH3678> in the high places<WH4791> of the city,<WH7176>
To call<WH7121> to those who pass<WH5674> by,<WH3474> who go straight on their ways,<WH734>
"Whoever is simple,<WH6612> let him turn in<WH5493> here.<WH2638>" as for him who is void of understanding,<WH3820> she says to him,<WH559>
"Stolen<WH1589> water<WH4325> is sweet.<WH4985> Food<WH3899> eaten in secret<WH5643> is pleasant.<WH5276>"
But he doesn't<WH3045> know that the dead<WH7496> are there,<WH7121> that her guests are in the depths<WH6012> of Sheol.<WH7585>
